title: WORLDS EMOTES AND ICONS `SALE`
body:
HELLOOO Summoners,

There are currently worlds icons and emotes discounted in store :D 

So go and support for FAV team (MINES TSM TSM TSM) and rep them on the rift. 

**Icons are _150RP _**( WOW SO CHEAP A SAVING OF 100RP)
**Emotes are separate from the icons and are _300RP _**(WOW SO CHEAP?)

Let me know which team(s) you will be repping for worlds 2017 !!!

GLHF fellow summoners {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
